testcase.name: Variable-Set Precondition relationship static analysis
testcase.description: Tests of variable-set precondition relationship static analysis

variation.name: Variable-set-precondition is not from variable-set to a precondition
variation.description: These are unique to formula linkbase, no general mechanism to test these is in place. In this test the precondition arc is from a formula (variable-set) to a filter. If it were deemed effective then the formula would fail to fire (no evaluations would occur), and the fact item in the result instance would not be generated.
